name: This Time Next Year
content: Makin promises forever only till the
So why don't you tell me
Will you still love me too
Or will I be losing you
After all the ups and downs
Just tell me I got nothin' to fear
With all of my heart and soul
Don;t want this love grow old
I feel you inside my heart
With every little thing you do
Makin promises forever only till the
So why don't you tell me
Will you still love me too
Or will I be losing you
After all the ups and downs
Just tell me I got nothin' to fear
Will you still love me too
Or will I be losing you
After all the ups and downs
Will you still love me too
Or will I be losing you
